attributes.action: crack down on Anti Social Behaviour in Mirfield
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The residants of Mirfield have had enough of Anti Social Behaviour in the town. The level of vandalism, crime and intimidating behaviour appears to be at an all time high and resulted in a local residant being kicked to death in the street.
We need tougher policing, CCTV and a deterent to stop these people running riot. 
An ASBO is seen as a social status to these people not as a punishment.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "crack down on Anti Social Behaviour in Mirfield."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15115.asp

Prime Minister's Office
